medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient developed crampy abdominal pain two nights ago after consuming undercooked tuna. The pain persisted through the night and became more constant, presenting as a dull aching pain in the epigastrium and mid abdomen.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Metastatic breast cancer with recent treatments including Taxol, history of biliary stents, chronic low back pain, hypothyroidism, insomnia, and mania.
medical_history.family_history: Maternal coronary artery disease, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease; paternal coronary artery disease.
